mapper.select: select rq.id, rq.User_Id, rq.Date, rq.Commentary,rq.State us.id, us.FirstName, us.LastName, us.Email,us.Phone,us.Cellphone,us.Program_Id,us.YearGraduate,us.BirthDate,us.Period from Request as rq LEFT JOIN User as us ON rq.User_Id=us.id WHERE rq.State='E'
